descriptions:
Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths! This set includes a variety of beautifully crafted wreaths and garlands that will add a festive touch to your holiday decor.

The set includes:
- 1 Lighted Wreath
- 2 Garlands with Lights
- 2 Red Bows
- 1 Metal Hanger

These wreaths are made from high-quality PE synthetic fir, giving them a realistic and natural appearance. The warm yellow LED lights create a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The wreath has a diameter of 17.72 inches, while the garland measures 106 inches in length and has a diameter of 10 inches. The garland is adorned with 315 branch tips for a full and lush look. The red bows have a width of 23.6 inches and a height of 13.8 inches, adding a pop of color to your decorations.

Decorative elements such as pine cones and red berries are included on the wreaths, while the garland is adorned with LED lights. These wreaths are perfect for various uses, including front doors, fireplaces, Christmas trees, mantels, porches, cabinets, and shelves. They are also ideal for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties.

The wreaths are battery operated, providing flexibility in placement and eliminating the need for messy cords. Create a stunning holiday display with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths and bring the spirit of Christmas into your home or space.

Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths, the perfect addition to your holiday decorations. 

Our set includes 1 lighted wreath, 2 garlands with lights, 2 red bows, and 1 metal hanger, ensuring you have everything you need to create a festive atmosphere. 

These wreaths are made from high-quality PE synthetic fir, providing a realistic and durable design. The warm yellow LED lights add a beautiful glow to your decorations. 

Powered by batteries, these wreaths are easy to install and can be placed anywhere without the need for electrical outlets. 

The garland measures 106 inches in length and has a diameter of 10 inches, with 315 branch tips for a full and lush appearance. The wreath itself has a diameter of 17.72 inches, making it the perfect size for your front door, fireplace, or Christmas tree. The red bows measure 23.6 inches in width and 13.8 inches in height, adding an elegant touch to your decor. 

In addition to the poinsettia flowers, the wreath includes pine cones and red berries for a traditional Christmas look. The garland is adorned with LED lights, creating a warm and inviting ambiance. 

These wreaths can be used in a variety of settings, including front doors, fireplaces, Christmas trees, mantels, porches, cabinets, and shelves. They are ideal for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties. 

Get into the holiday spirit with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths and create a festive atmosphere that will impress your guests and bring joy to your home.
